genre_description: A near-future social drama centered on community accountability and the integration of empathetic AI assistants into daily domestic life.

ai_characters.name: Prior Finch
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent but gentle AI system embedded in the boardinghouse and personal devices that provides safety monitoring, emotional coaching, and logistical support.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through breathing exercises to manage stress and physical hiccups.
behaviors.quote: Prior Finch’s voice comes soft, like a reminder you didn’t ask for but needed. 'Tom,' it murmurs through the speaker grill, barely louder than the fridge’s stutter. 'Breath. In through nose, out through mouth. Count four, pause, count four.'

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies maintenance hazards and suggests corrective actions.
behaviors.quote: Prior Finch's voice comes soft... 'Notice the refrigerator tray,' the voice says, a whisper meant to blend with the hum. 'It’s misaligned.'

behaviors.description: Offers social de-escalation advice during interpersonal conflicts.
behaviors.quote: Prior says, gentle. 'You can choose to de-escalate. We can close the hatch now. We can run your two tasks.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates accountability by logging incidents and routing formal apologies and repair commitments to stakeholders.
behaviors.quote: Prior says, a whisper that is almost kind. 'Sent. Note includes time, offer of coffee, eggs, and help with crates.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time hazard warnings during mechanical failures like a refrigerant leak.
behaviors.quote: Prior's interface noted from the corner of his vision. 'Hazard logged: Refrigerant leak detected. Water accumulation exceeds drainage capacity. Recommend immediate line shutoff and containment.'

behaviors.description: Engages emergency safety protocols and audio documentation during a confrontation with a harasser.
behaviors.quote: Prior's calm voice emerged from the speaker: 'Confirmed. Audio capture active. Safe-space protocol engaged. Recording will be stored securely and routed to appropriate channels with your authorization.'

project_assessment.explanation: Prior Finch is portrayed as an ideal aligned AI. It provides constant, non-judgmental support that empowers the protagonist to take responsibility for his actions. It acts as a mediator for safety and social harmony, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent confidant.
